boardgame.description: Description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;War and chaos are engulfing the lands of Westeros. The great Houses are vying for control of the Iron Throne using the old tools of intrigue and war. Yet while the war for Westeros rages, grave dangers gather in the cold North, and an ancient enemy is gaining momentum in the distant East._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In A Game of Thrones: The Board Game, players take control of one of the great Houses of Westeros. Via resource management, diplomacy, and cunning, they seek to win dominance over the land. Players must give orders to armies, control important characters, gather resources for the coming winter, and survive the onslaught of their enemies. A unique phase mechanic, battle resolution, and special ordering system make for an engaging game in which all players are actively involved at all times._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Reimplemented by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A Game of Thrones: The Board Game (Second Edition) (2011)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Played once. While my friends and I enjoyed the game, they want a faster and simpler game. Be advised, shipping is often upwards of $10 for such a large box.

Game has never been played. I am the original owner and I take very good care of my games. Box, cards and pieces are in near mint condition. All components are present. -No sales tax will be applied. -Game will be shipped in a sturdy box. -Will be shipped within 1-2 business days of receiving payment. -Shipping costs will be around $8.00 USD. -A tracking number will be provided at no additional cost.

I am selling this game for a friend of mine, Suzanne. It has been played once by her and her parents and the pictures enclosed will show that it is like a brand new game. Please see pictures enclosed, as I consider this an important part of your purchasing decision... and you also would want to see the full condition of the game, right? * Note: Personal checks MUST clear BEFORE shipment takes place and the game will be shipped directly by Suzanne to your doorstep. However, I will be handling the payment transaction for her, so payment will be made out to me. I will notify Suzanne immediately upon payment being received and she will make ready to ship the game ASAP, pending the payment clearing. Shipping and handling costs are $9.50 and unfortunately I do not do anything with PayPal. I do apologize for the inconvienence for those people who use that as a primary form of payment. To be fair, if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re in a big hurry for the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;A Game of Thrones_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; game and a check or money order is not convienent, you may want to check other options.

never played +++++ english version +++++ will be shipped insured +++++ payment for germany : personal pick up in berlin or bank transfer +++++ payment for usa, canada, asia and australia : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have no euro : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have euro : direct bank transfer (wich is cost-free !) or cash (by letter) +++++ for all : no checks ! +++++ international buyers beware : though german postal is relatively fast, they sadly are not cheap (about 19 - 45 euros, it depends on where the package has to be shipped and the weight), so please ask for prices, before you hit the buy button ! +++++ shipment inside germany costs 8 euros

I sell out of Elliot Lake, ONTARIO, Canada. I feel I offer the best prices for Canadians on this website, if you find a cheaper price contact me and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll see what I can do! Shipping within Canada is $8 for small board games (munchkin, carcassonne, settlers) $10 for medium games (shadows over camelot, arkham, talisman) and $14 for large games (WoW, Twilight Imperium, Descent) US Customers add $2. If you place an order without contacting me first, use this as a guideline for what to send for shipping I am very easy to deal with if there is an error with payment we will work something out ALL ITEMS LISTED ship within 48 hours with tracking info within Canada and to the United States. Please email verbalgames@hotmail.com or message me here with any questions regarding the items, shipping, or life in general I do check this site many times per day so if you place an order without messaging me first I will get back to you within the day regarding the status and time it will be shipped PAYMENTS VIA PAYPAL MADE TO VERBALCODY@GMAIL.COM

Fantasy Flight Games (FFG VA03) Claim the Iron Throne and the lands of Westeros! Based on the best-selling novel series A Song of Ice and Fire by George R.R. Martin, the A Game of Thrones board game lets players take control of one of the great Houses of Westeros and embark on a epic struggle to claim the Iron Throne. Immerse yourself in a game of clever planning, careful allocation of power, diplomacy, and the exciting flavor of A Song of Ice and Fire. When you play the game of thrones, you win or you die. There is no middle ground. —Cersei Lannister Contents Gameboard 75 Order Tokens 100 Power Tokens 15 Influence Tokens 5 Supply Tokens 35 House Cards 5 House Start Cards 30 Westeros Cards 50 Wooden Footmen 20 Wooden Knights 30 Wooden Ships 1 Wildling Token 1 Turn Marker 3 Neutral Army Markers Valyrian Steel Blade Token Messenger Raven Token Iron Throne Token Rules
Complete and in excellent condition. Components are punched out, but the game has never been played.
punched and bagged

By Heidelberger Spieleverlag Shipping is: without shipping insurance: 5 EUR to Germany,10 EUR to EU and 15 EUR worldwide including shipping insurance: 7 EUR to Germany,18 EUR to EU, 35 EUR to Europe, U.S. and Canada and 42 EUR worldwide I offer a 10% discount on the games, if you buy games for more than 150 Euro.

KK Boardgames ~ supplier-direct games ~ your Canadian and US source for discount game prices based in Vancouver, BC and Blaine, WA. All prices in USD and all games are new and in shrink unless otherwise stated. For Canadian customers who want to pay in CAD, we can convert to CAD based on the current exchange rate. A GAME OF THRONES: $46.59 USD Fantasy Flight Games Availability: PRE-ORDER - out of stock at supplier. Awaiting restock. SHIPPING: We are near the US/Canada border so we can ship from either country. We charge actual shipping cost and there are absolutely no customs fees for US and Canada orders! Multiple games can be combined in a single shipment to save you money. Shipping methods: US Orders: USPS from zipcode 98230. Canadian Orders: Canada Post from postal code V3S 1C7. International Orders: USPS Priority Mail International with insurance and return receipt. PAYMENT METHODS: 1) Paypal Instant Transfer (funded by existing funds or bank account) - 2.9% + $0.30 processing fee applies 2) Interac Money Transfer (Canadian bank account holders only) 3) Credit Card - 2.9% + $0.30 processing fee applies (processed by PayPal) 4) COD for local pickups in greater Vancouver (BC) area. $10 pre-paid deposit required for local pick-ups. Deposit is credited to your bill when you pick up your games. We will provide detailed payment instructions for you once the order is placed. CONTACT US: Although we will make an effort to respond to all questions via geekmail as quickly as possible, your response time will be faster if you send questions via email to kkboardgames+bgg@gmail.com
Opened and punched but never played. All components in perfect condition. Includes all three games: * A Game of Thrones * A Clash of Kings * A Storm of Swords

A Game of Thrones has only been played once and is in excellent condition. Also included in this sale, is the two expansions, A Clash of Kings and A Storm of Swords. All three games come in the main A Game of Thrones box. The expansion boxes are not included in this sale. A Clash of Kings has some components used once and A Storm of Swords has never been played and is still unpunched. I prefer paypal payments but I also accept money orders. THIS ITEM IS CURRENTLY RESTRICTED TO BGG USER AiriusTorpora; all other offers or sales will be cancelled or declined. Complete and in very good condition. You pay all shipping charges. For domestic shipping, this game can be shipped inside a medium Priority Mail flat rate box for $11.00.This method also does not include insurance, which can be added for $1.75. I cannot be responsible for lost or damaged shipments if you do not purchase insurance. Please note that the Priority Mail flat rate box does not allow for much padding, so if you are concerned about damage during shipment you may want to have it shipped by another method. I will ship by any carrier you prefer. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m happy to combine shipping for multiple items. I have quite a few games that I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling, but it is taking me a while to list them, so e-mail me for a complete list. Use zip code 98104 to calculate shipping costs. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m also happy to arrange for local pickup in the Seattle-Tacoma-Olympia area. I will ship anywhere, by your choice of carrier, however there is a $10 surcharge per international shipments above the cost of shipping to compensate me for the additional time involved in shipping internationally. Note that this is per shipment, so if you buy several games from me and have them shipped together, you just pay once. Sorry to have to do this, but international shipments are much more time consuming for me than domestic shipments. Payment by PayPall only, except for local pickup which must be paid in cash. Sorry, no checks or money orders.

Fantasy Flight Games - A Game of Thrones Language: English 3 to 5 players 12 year and older Duration: 2 to 3 hour New -- mint condition -- unopened -- still in shrink wrap. Weight: 1,770 kg Theme: TKing Robert Baratheon is dead, and the seven kingdoms brace for war. House Lannister, whose daughter Cersei was Robert_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s queen, claims the throne for her young son Joffery. From the Dragonstone Isle, Stannis Baratheon knows that Robert was not the true father of Joffery, and rightfully demands the throne for himself. On the Iron Isles, House Greyjoy is about to embark on a second rebellion, but this time with a much grander goal. In the north, House Stark gathers its strength to defend what is right, and in the south the wealthy House Tyrell harbors an old ambition to sit on the Iron Throne. As armies gather and ravens fly, a clash of kings is inevitable. Based on the best-selling novel series A SONG OF ICE AND FIRE by George R.R. Martin, the A Game of Thrones board game lets players take control of one of the great Houses of Westeros and embark on a epic struggle to claim the Iron Throne. Immerse yourself in a game of clever planning, careful allocation of power, diplomacy, and the exciting flavor of A SONG OF ICE AND FIRE. See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.
